Shunt-TLM SystemC API (namespace shunt_tlm)
Types
shunt_tlm_command
SHUNT_TLM_END_SIM

end of Client simulation, send by Server

enum shunt_tlm_command {
SHUNT_TLM_END_SIM =tlm_command::TLM_IGNORE_COMMAND+1
};
